flashcards.english: The one who eats alone dies alone (Share what you have)
flashcards.notes: Monday proverb (Jumatatũ) teaching community values. Vocabulary: Kũrĩa (to eat), wiki (alone), Mũrĩa (one who eats - agent), Gũkũa (to die), Akuaga (he/she dies). Moral: importance of sharing and community support
